instructions: From any Home screen, tap Apps . Tap Settings . Scroll to 'System,' then tap Date and time . Tap Automatic time zone to select the check box. Tap Automatic date and time to select the check box.

From any Home screen, tap Apps . Tap Settings . Scroll to 'System,' then tap Date and time . Tap Automatic date and time to clear the check box. 'Set date' and 'Set time' light up and are now accessible. Tap Set date to set the date. When finished, tap Set . Tap Set time to set the time. When finished, tap Set .
